text:
I recommend to exclude the forms editor from the release. At least we should
disable the CMS menu entry "Edit with Forms".
We can reenable it in a bugfix release like 1.2.1 .

WDYT ?
See also bug 29293 (essentially these seem to be duplicates).
creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
